notes: Grimshaw gave the length of the body as 4.5 mm. and the wings as 5.5 mm.
Grimshaw, in the original description, measured the body as mm. and the wings as 6 mm.
This species is quite variable in size.
Grimshaw in the original gave the length as body 3.25 mm. and wings 3.50 mm.
Grimshaw gave the length of the body as 6.0-7.0 mm. and the wings as 7.0 mm.
